response.original_title: In the Wake of Our Ancestors
response.overview: In the Wake of Our Ancestors invites audiences to participate in the strength of Ancestral knowledge and the hope for a shared tomorrow. “What does it mean to be Indigenous right now?” Through personal stories and a shared tapestry of traditions, the series paints an inspiring portrait of individuals and communities weaving together the threads of past, present, and future.
response.title: In the Wake of Our Ancestors
